title: Lakai horse blanket
description: predominantly red textile with multicolored embroidery in the form of floral and paisley designs, as well as a central gold fourteen pointed star; textile has curved edges; gold tasseled fringe decorates most of textile\'s edges; white beads attached to some of gold fringe; back of textile has red and black floral patterned fabric
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
